html:
Thunderstorm with hail
Crawling maggots
Meal in a pot
Warmth at a calm night
When a soldier goes on war
And when mills mill grain
An enslaved man dreams
Of future days of freedom
Roads lead the cars
A cat dozes off on an armchair
Argument in an office
Between clerks and an applicant
Constellations at night
Shine so beautifully
Void echo resonates
Smoked cigarette dims
title: Grain
